metadata.title: TravelTang - Your Ultimate Guide to Traveling in China
metadata.description: TravelTang provides comprehensive guides and AI-powered assistance for international travelers visiting China. Get payment setup guides and city travel guides, plus 24/7 AI travel assistant.
metadata.keywords: TravelTang, China Travel Guide, Alipay WeChat Setup, Travel Assistant, China Tourism
